chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: Most features of Seam Reports are installed automatically by including the seam-reports-api.jar and the respective provider implementation (along with its dependencies) in the web application library folder. If you are using Maven as your build tool, you can add the following dependency to your pom.xml file:
chapter.programlisting:
<dependency> <groupId>org.jboss.seam.reports</groupId> <artifactId>seam-reports-api</artifactId> <version>${seam-reports-version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- If you are using Jasper Reports, add the following dependency --> <dependency> <groupId>org.jboss.seam.reports</groupId> <artifactId>seam-reports-jasperreports</artifactId> <version>${seam-reports-version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- If you are using Pentaho, add the following dependency --> <dependency> <groupId>org.jboss.seam.reports</groupId> <artifactId>seam-reports-pentaho</artifactId> <version>${seam-reports-version}</version> </dependency>

tip.para: Replace ${seam-reports-version} with the most recent or appropriate version of Seam Reports.
